akn:content.akn:p: §§ 196 to 198. Transferred Editorial Notes Codification Section 196, Aug. 9, 1954, ch. 659, § 1, 68 Stat. 675; Pub. L. 96–70, title III, § 3302(c), Sept. 27, 1979, 93 Stat. 498; Pub. L. 97–31, § 12(152), Aug. 6, 1981, 95 Stat. 167, was redesignated as and transferred to section 56309 of Title 46, Shipping, by Pub. C, title XXXV, § 3504(c)(1), Dec. 12, 2017, 131 Stat. 1912.
